document_data.name: Quivers Antinnia
document_data.mainbody: '''Quivers Antinnia''' was an unsavory [[human]] [[archer]] [[mercenary]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Quivers was a dark-skinned [[human]] male adorned in quality [[Leather armor|leathers]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the opportunistic and amoral mercenary [[Aradin Beno]] set out to find the [[Nightsong]] for the [[mage]] [[Lorroakan]]. If the Nightsong, in reality a [[Sel√ªnite]] [[aasimar]], was to reach the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], then Beno had a band of mercenaries with questionable morals ready to attack those who sheltered her. The archer named Quivers Antinnia was among those mercenaries, ready to break into the [[Elfsong Tavern]] to kill and kidnap.
